metadata.title: AI Cruiser
metadata.author: R4V3-0N and Chronklo Vortex
metadata.description:
This mod adds a new race of AI hardlight Avatars from a distant universe which will eventually be developed upon further, both with type B and C layouts as well as eventually events and lore.
This sample includes: • AI Cruiser type A • 3 New Weapons ◦ Effector mk I, a projector that hacks into enemy systems. ◦ Auto Beam, a beam that after firing drops to a quick 2.5 second cooldown ◦ Splitter Focus Beam II, a 'flak beam' that fires 4 focus beams. • New Race: AI Avatar's, a synthetic race of disposable hardlight avatars with many immunities • New Augment: Hologram Emmiter, an augment that lets you produce an AI hologram when one perishes.
Load after Multiverse.
